name: Give It Up: Spring Festival
description:
Feel the Rhythm. Dodge Evil Mushrooms. Give It Up.
• No In-Apps • No Ads •

It is a rather hard game where you assist the Always Happy Pink Bunny jumping on Spring Mushrooms over 9 different tracks.

Sounds easy right?

However... when you tap off rhythm, poor Bunny can't jump.. and instantly explodes into a pink blob.
Yeah, it is such a delicate Bunny.
Fortunately, we recycle the pink blob into an Even Happier Pink Bunny for FREE just for you, so you can try again.

Who will love it?
• Who love challenges
• Who enjoy sweating during the game
• Who can put on the rhythm
• Who love cute jumping bunnies
• Who don't fear for their devices

Who will hate it?
• EVERYONE

..but it's guaranteed that you won't put it down.

Bonus: new daily challenge every day!
